about_the_game:
"RrrrrAbbits" is an exciting 3D action game where you become the leader of a rabbit herd, issuing commands to your fellow rabbits, fending off attacking crows, and expanding your group while striving for global harmony and balance.

Note: The "r" in "RrrrrAbbits" is carried away in the logo, so the actual reading is "Rarararabbits."

【Story】

In a peaceful forest, crows suddenly appeared, and one by one, the rabbits were being taken away!

At that moment, the Rabbit God descended. The Rabbit God granted a portion of divine power to the leader rabbit.

Now, as the leader rabbit, you embark on an adventure to rescue your fellow rabbits!

As you chase the crows, you begin to uncover the mystery behind their sudden massive appearance...

What is the secret of the crows?

Before you know it, a grand story involving the mysteries of the world and the gods unfolds before you...!

【Key Features】

  • Casual Action Gameplay!
    Take control of the leader rabbit and use special abilities to fend off crows.
    Simple controls make it easy for anyone to enjoy the action!

  • A Swarm of Crows!
    The crows will try various tactics to capture the rabbits in your herd.
    Work together with your fellow rabbits to fight back!

  • Give Commands to Your Rabbit Herd!
    Your rabbit companions are usually carefree, but they will follow your instructions to perform useful actions!
    While they are carrying out tasks, protect them as their leader.
    Sometimes… they may not listen to you, but please be patient with them!

  • Explore the World!
    Hidden rare rabbits, story-related items, and other surprises await in the vast map.
    Some special discoveries might only appear at certain times of the day…!?

  • Expand Your Burrow! (In Development)
    Enjoy life in your burrow with your rabbit herd!
    Gather new homes and decorations to enhance and personalize your burrow.

  • Co-op Multiplayer (Under Consideration)
    When your friend’s leader rabbit is in trouble, you can join their herd and help them out!
    Cooperative gameplay makes the adventure even more exciting.

  • Rabbit Customization (Under Review)
    Customize your leader rabbit to your liking!

Get ready for a heartwarming and action-packed adventure in RrrrrAbbits—will you lead your herd to victory and uncover the mysteries of the world?
